alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Lafayette (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 25 at 4:12PM CDT until September 25 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Lafayette County in southwestern Arkansas... Southwestern Columbia County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 412 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bussey, or 8 miles south of Stamps, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Stamps, Taylor, Bussey, Smithland, Macedonia, Cornelius, Lerch, McKamie, State Line, Horsehead and Mars Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
